item.description:
hello again.

saturday is supposed to be a nice day, so let's roll around the river for awhile and enjoy the weather.

this skate is for all skill levels, so please come on out and get some exercise with us. i'll be happy to assist and instruct beginners and i'll skate with 'the pack' for the duration of the skate.

as usual, if you're an advanced or intermediate skater, please feel free to skate ahead ... but come on back and chat once in awhile.

i'll be at the hatch shell by 10:45 and we'll take off at 11. we're just going to skate along the river for an hour or so and we'll probably finish the skate at the hatch shell as well.

after the skate, i'm heading to the border cafe, 32 church st, harvard square for a delicious margarita and a bite. please feel free to join me there, too.
item.how_to_find_us: i will email a cell # to all Yes and Maybe RSVPers early saturday morning
item.name: All Skill Level Skate @ The Hatch Shell (margaritas optional)
